title: Mecha Zero Sion causes huge FPS drops
body: I average around 60 FPS through the entire game and never have a problem, played 2 games with new Mecha Sion and it dropped to 13 and even 5 at times throughout the entire match.

replies.body:
Hey NazZomLord -

We did compatibility testing while Mecha Zero Sion was in development, and didn't notice anything crazy occurring, even on lower spec machines.

Would you happen to have more information as to when this drops may be occurring for you? Also, would you mind providing your specs?

Thanks!

They stopped 2 days after i got the skin, it was just with skin on, i played on other champs and even vanilla Sion and they never happened. Just with the skin, its fine now. My computer far surpasses what is needed for LOL.

Hmm. That's interesting. The one thing I've noticed with some reports is the vibrating on the train is throwing people off, but I don't see why that would cause an FPS drop - if anything, I would assume it'd be the transformation. Buuut, if your computer's specs are above what's needed, that's a bit less likely to be the issue.
